Package wobani.component.light.blinnphong

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlinnPhongDirectionalLightComponent
    Basic implementation of a directional light source.
    BlinnPhongLightComponent
    This abstract class stores the light's diffuse, specular and ambient components.
    BlinnPhongLightSources
    Stores the Blinn-Phong light sources and refreshes them in the VRAM if necessary.
    BlinnPhongLightSources.LightSourceTile  
    BlinnPhongPointLightComponent
    Basic implementation of a point light source.
    BlinnPhongPositionalLightComponent
    A Blinn-Phong light source which uses it's position and has attenuation.
    BlinnPhongShaderHelper
    A helper class which helps the Blinn-Phong light sources in the communication with the VGA.
    BlinnPhongSpotLightComponent
    Basic implementation of a spot light source.
